Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham came to the rescue for England in the last minute of stoppage-time to earn Gareth Southgate's side a 2-2 draw against Belgium.
Kobbie Mainoo was the star of the show on his first start at just 18 years old.
Ivan Toney did his Euro 2024 hopes no damage with a fine display that included a goal from the penalty spot - his first for his country.
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored Real Madrid to win based on their current form.
Pep Guardiola emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Heavy rain delayed the match by 30 minutes.
